response.overview: Based on Paolo Hewitt’s Forever the People, Wonderwall delves into the turbulent lives of Oasis as they rule the world of rock and roll, offering an intimate portrait of Liam and Noel Gallagher at the height of their fame. Amidst a whirlwind global tour, the brothers navigate the intoxicating highs of success, the chaos of their volatile relationship, and the weight of their creative rivalry. From electric performances that captivate millions to private moments of vulnerability and raw emotion, Wonderwall captures the fleeting beauty of connection in the face of fame’s isolating glare. Told through the band’s iconic music, this is a story about brotherhood, love, and the search for meaning amidst the noise.
response.title: Wonderwall
